question: A friend you made while you were studying abroad has written to ask you for help in finding a job in your country. You have heard about a job in a local company that might be suitable for him/her. Write a letter to this friend. In your letter • Tell your friend about the job and what sort of work it involves • Say why you think the job would be suitable for him/her • Explain how to apply for the job
text: How are you? I have received the letter that wants me to assist you to find a job in China. I am glad that you have this idea. Now I have acquired a job in a local company that may be suitable for you from my former colleague who is a manager in the personnel department of that corporation.

This company is finding a big client sales manager who has a background of foreign country work experiences that can help them develop their oversee markets. The primary thing is to analyse the business environment of a particular division market . You should locate the target customer group by using different kinds of methods to promise  sales success.

I think this occupation is suitable for you, because it is strongly related to your major which is mainly focused on  international sales management. During our common learning periods, lecturers have taught us abundant data analysis methods and market research tools that will help us to come up with such assignments effectively.

To apply for this job, you will need to fill out a form that is about your personal information which I have attached at the end of this email. I am really looking forward to hearing the good news from you and seeing you again in the future.

error_list.error_des: It appears that you have an unnecessary comma before the dependent clause marker because. Consider removing the comma.
